name: Family Child Care Home Education Network (FCCHEN)
description: FCCHEN Program Offerings and Benefits for Parents: - Child care financial assistance with a provider in our network - Early Childhood Coaching for families and child care providers - Child Care observations using a comprehensive child development tool to support quality learning environments - Child observations and assessments to document and reflect on your child’s learning and development - Learn more about your child’s development and areas for growth through Parent conferences and progress
